lead_paragraph: A federal regulator has given the blood-testing company 10 days to correct the problems, one of which it said posed a threat to patient safety.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Regulator Finds a Theranos Lab Violated Some Blood Test Standards
headline.main: Theranos Lab May Pose Threat to Patient Safety, Regulator Says

snippet: A federal regulator has given the blood-testing company 10 days to correct the problems, one of which it said posed a threat to patient safety.
abstract: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services has sent letter warning Theranos of several violations of clinical standards at its Newark, Calif, laboratory, raising possibility that lab could lose its certification; letter says company has 10 days to correct violations, one of which could pose threat to patients' safety.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
